Fields for the windows titel:
Init is important, cause for the calling task OID706C1-telephone notes
a zero means, that the Cancel-Button was hit. So old data must not
remain in the PO.RISC_ID to take the correct decision:
If task reenters the screen (i.e. after error message, it positions centered on
the current row:
Get data for the screen; therefore delete temp table first:
-- Get window position
Delete empty window record, just in case:
Restore old Magic.ini entry:
If call comes from Creditman and no window dimension record exists already,
the default dimensions must not be taken from the screen itself
(which is optimized for 800x600 solution)
but as defined here:
Start main screen:
Stop the user, if he clicked on a background windows.
"It's mandatory to leave this window with Ok or Cancel-Button!"
If user hit Cancel-Button or ESC after changes...:
If there were changes...:
...ask for confirmation of Cancel-Button:
If user stopped cancelation -> Return to screen (no saving now):
If user confirmed cancelation -> Stop task, no saving will be done:
if there were no changes, the user can leave without any confirmation:
"Fake" a Cancel-Button hit, in case of ESC-key, so that the task ends:
:End: any changes
:End Cancel-Button or ESC
Save data, if Ok-Button was hit:
-- Save window position
-- set
-- get
This is screen does not take part in the ordinary MUI-environment of credMan!
It is opened "within" the saving process of telephone notes and the user has
to care of this screen first and then leave it with Ok or Cancel-Button.
After that the window is closed ALWAYS.
In this sence this screen is modal to the application.
In case of reentering the screen, for locate on the last record:
Save, that something on screen was changed (and forced the flow to
execute the Record Suffix here). Should the user try to cancel his changes later
he will have to confirm that from now on:
Checkbox Selected
Verify, if the user is allowed to select an option and
count the number ofselected rows.
Checked the Selection:
If just 1 action was allowed to select, but the user tried to mark a second row:
Unchecked the selection:
Link to Temp table, if any record , don't copy again
This field is updated in the Record Suffix:
(Link cnd: NO: SCR 9469!:)
(Return parameter gets its value in the call!)
Save changes in remarks: NO (SCR 9469!)
